description: folded aluminum bank; joints secured by tabs; in the form of a birdhouse with ref roof, back and base; perch at front acts as a coin receptacle; hand crank at right side animates a green and yellow bird which emerges from the house and using its beak, clamps on to the coin and takes in back into the house where it releases the coin; boy with fiddle and crouching boy with donkey decorate sides
title: "Bird, Mushroom, and Squirrel" mechanical bank
